string.value: Nakalimutan mo na agad? Hindi ka pa kasali sa laro!
Si {0} ay nagsimula ng laro! Gamitin ang /join para makasali! Sa sobrang saya mo makakalimutan mo na pangalan mo!
Isang bagong laro ang sinimulan ni {0}! Gamitin ang /join para makain ng makakalimuting mga wuff!
Si {0} ay nagsimula ng magulong laro! Gamitin ang /join para makisali sa kalituhan!
Isang bagong magulong laro ang sinimulan ni {0}! Gamitin ang /join para mamatay ng biglaan!
Nakalimutan mong sumali bago mag-umpisa ang laro! Gamitin ang /nextgame at i-p-pm kita pag may mag-uumpisang laro na ulit para hindi mo na makalimutan!
Kasali ka na kaya! Nakalimutan mo na ba?
1 minuto nalang para sumali! Wag kalimutan gamitin ang /join para makasali!
{0} segundo nalang para sumali. Gamitin ang /join para sumali.
Nakalimutan ng lahat sumali! Kulang tayo ng players. Mamaya nalang pag naalala na nila.
Magsisimula na ang laro. Nagbibigay na ako ng roles. May kakaibang nangyayari sa baranggay! Sa di malamang dahilan, nakalimutan ng lahat kung sino sila! (Ang roles ay hindi malalaman ng players)
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
Nakalimutan mo na ba? May kapangalan ka dito na {0}, Palitan mo nalang pangalan mo para makasali.
Pasensya ka na. Puno na ang bus. Subok ka nalang ulit sumali /nextgame.
Nakalimutan ni {0} kung sino siya! {1} na ang nakakalimot, {2} hangang {3} lang ang pwede sumali.
{0}, Wag mo kalimutan i-PM si bot! Pindutin ang button sa baba o kaya: {1}, tapos pindustin ang start. Hanggat di mo ginagawa yan di ka pwede sumali.
Nakalimutan mong nakalimutan mong huminga kanina? Ano ba yan.
Kinalimutan na ni {0} ang pamilya and barkada niya. Nakalimutan na din niya umuwi! Naligaw na siya.
Nakalimot na si {0}, pero siya ang {1}
{0} na ulyanin nalang ang natitira.
You don't even know who you are but you already want to do something? Take a breath! I didn't ask you anything yet!
Nakalimutan mo na agad? Di mo pwede gawin yan hanggat di ka naglalaro!
Nakalimutan mo na ata kung sino talaga pinag-uusapan natin... Wala naman akong kilalang player na ganyan ang pangalan!
Did you forget how to play too? This answer is not valid!

Lumubog na ang araw. Umuwi na ang lahat para matulog, umaasang pag gising nila naaalala na nila ulit ang lahat. Mga may night activity, meron kayong {0} segundo para kumilos!
Nakapagdesisyon na ang mga villagers. Umaasang tama ang desisyon nila. Patay na si {0}. {1}
Dahil hindi sila magkasundo, umuwi nalang silang lahat para matulog...
Mukang nakalimot ang lahat bumoto! Walang magigising ang lahat bukas ng umaga...

Nagkita-kita ang mga villagers sa umaga pero hindi nila nakita si {0}. Pinuntahan nila siya sa bahay at nakita nila ang bangkay niya. Habang hinahanap nila ang salarin, nakakita sila ng dalawang chapa ng pulis. Bakit kaya dalawa?
Umaga na ng makita ng lahat ang bangkay sa harap ng simbahan. May pakpak ito pero bali bali. Si {0} ay patay na.

Umaga na, maraming tambay ang nakapansin ng nagkalat ang mga bala ng baril, mga piraso ng paa, at ilang daliri... Nagulat ang lahat nang sa Fountain sa tapat ng barangay hall, nakita nila ang katawan ni {0}, kinain ng werewolf. Wala na kayong gunner.
Umaga na nang makita ng mga tambay ang gutay-gutay na katawan ni {0} sa harap ng isang mesa na may Ouija Board at Tarot Cards. Patay na si Madam Auring.
Nagising ang lahat sa amoy ng nasusunog na alak at kahoy... Nasusunog ang kaisa-isang bar sa barangay!!! Matapos mapatay ang apoy, nakita nila ang katawan ni {0} sunog na sunog at may mga kagat.
Umaga na nang makita ng mga tambay and gutay-gutay na katawan ni {0} sa harap ng isang mesa na may Snakes and Ladders at may hawak na... Pokemon Cards? Isa siyang FOOL!
Nagising ang mga tambay dahil sa masangsang na amoy. Sinundan nila ang amoy, para makita si {0}. Patay na. {1}

Nagising ang mga tambay dahil sa masangsang na amoy na galing sa bahay ni {0}... Pumasok sila sa bahay at nakita nila ang katawan niya sa harap ng gawa-gawang altar... Isang kulto ang napatay ng hunter!
Nagkita-kita ang mga tambay ng umaga para magchismisan. Complete attendance and barkada. Mukang walang inatake kagabi.

Si {0} ay nakalimutang bumoto at namatay na dahil sa hindi pagboto ng {1} beses sa loob ng 24 oras.

Every player is a villager, able to vote every day to try and lynch the village's enemies (or their own...), but some people are nothing other than villagers! In that case, they won't have any actions for the whole game (other than the lynch vote), and their deaths will only make a difference as another number.
NO ACTIONS, ever!

The Seer may choose a player every night, and will find out their role once morning comes. Careful when revealing what you've found out to others, though: lots of people in the villager want a Seer dead... Trust no one, not even yourself: you may be the fool! (/aboutfool) When looking at the Traitor, there's a 50% chance of seeing them as either a villager or a wolf.
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

Every night, all wolves in the pack vote to decide who to attack. Not all players should be attacked, though! The newest wolf in a pack will be killed if the Serial Killer is attacked, and may be killed if the target is the Hunter (30% chance for a sole wolf to die - and not be able to kill the Hunter! - and an additional 20% chance for the newest wolf to die for each additional wolf in the pack!) All wolves will get drunk if they attack the Village Drunk, and won't be able to do any actions the next night! The Harlot probably won't be home, so the night will be wasted if you try to attack them! Good news, though: if you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf along with you! If you kill a Wild Child's rolemodel, they will also become a wolf!
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

The Harlot will be given the chance to visit another player each night. They will notice something happened, even if they don't remember what. The harlot dies if they visit a wolf or the Serial Killer, so visiting is a good way to find safe players, even if it's as a sacrifice! The harlot will also die if they visit a house attacked by the wolves or if the Serial Killer chooses to kill them! When visiting a cultist, the harlot has a 50% chance of finding out their role!
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

The Drunk is just like a villager... Except when they're killed by wolves! Then the wolves will become drunk too, and unable to attack on the next night!
NO ACTIONS, ever!

The Cursed is just like a villager... Until they're attacked by the wolves! Then they become a wolf as well, and join the pack!
NO ACTIONS, until their role changes!

strings.string:
The Traitor is just like a villager... Until all wolves die! Then they take over the mantle and become a werewolf, ready to attack the villagers! When the Seer looks at the Traitor, there's a 50% chance of the traitor appearing as either a villager or a wolf.
NO ACTIONS, until their role changes!

string.value:
The Guardian Angel can choose one player each night to protect from attacks, either from wolves or the Serial Killer. However, if they choose to protect one of those they should protect from, they may be killed!
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

Every day, the Detective can choose a player to investigate, and will find out what their role is. There is a 40% chance the werewolves will see the Detective investigating someone, though!
DAY ACTIONS, every day!

strings.string:
During the day, the Gunner will be given the chance to shoot (and kill!) another player. The whole village will know who did it, so they will (probably) not lynch the Gunner, knowing they're on the villagers' side! There are only two bullets on their gun, though...
DAY ACTIONS, but it can only be used twice!

string.value:
The Tanner is just like a villager... But if they're lynched, they win the game!
NO ACTIONS, ever!

The Fool has no way of knowing they aren't actually the Seer... When choosing a player to find out their role, they will instead get told a random role out of all roles of alive players.
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

Every night, all cultists in the cult vote to decide who to convert. The cult wins when every single alive player is a cultist. It's not that simple to convert players, though!
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

The Cultist Hunter has a single job: kill all cultists. Every night, they get to visit a player, who won't feel anything... unless they are a cultist, in which case, the Cultist Hunter will kill them! If the cult chooses to convert the CH, their newest member dies.
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

The Wild Child chooses a player as their rolemodel during the first night of the game. Once their role model dies, the Wild Child becomes a werewolf!
FIRST NIGHT ACTION, then none until their role changes!

The Apprentice Seer is just like a villager... Until the Seer dies, in which case, they will become the new Seer!
NO ACTIONS, until their role changes!

The Beholder is just like a villager, but, if there's a Seer in the game, they will be told their name. If the Seer dies and the Apprentice Seer and/or the Doppelgänger become Seer, the Beholder will also be told!
NO ACTIONS, but they do get information!

A mason is just like a villager, except they will always know who the other masons are! If a mason is converted to the cult, all other masons will be told!
NO ACTIONS, but they do get information!

The Doppelgänger chooses a player during the first night of the game. Once they die, the Doppelgänger will become what they were! Unless the player was converted to the cult, the Doppelgänger will become what they were at the time of death! When becoming a Wild Child, the Doppelgänger will inherit their role model. The Doppelgänger cannot be converted to a cultist until they change roles, and will not be able to win (except as a lover) unless they've changed roles!
FIRST NIGHT ACTION, then none until their role changes!

The Cupid will choose two players at the start of the game and make them fall in love with each other. If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow... If one of them is on the winning team at the end of the game, both will be winners! If the only players left standing are the Lovers, they will be the winners! The Cupid can choose themselves as one of the Lovers.
FIRST NIGHT ACTIONS, then none!

The Hunter is just like a villager... Until someone visits them, or they die! Anyone who visits the Hunter's house will find themselves dead (other than the cult - there's a 50% chance the cult will convert the Hunter, and then a 50% chance a cultist will be killed if the conversion fails), unless they go there to attack the Hunter. The Serial Killer will be able to kill the Hunter, and a pack of wolves will also be able to do that... However, the Hunter won't go down without a fight! When they're killed - be it by lynching or a murder, but not a wolf attack - the Hunter will be given a choice to shoot and kill someone out of the players alive! Wolf attacks work differently, though! If a sole wolf attacks the hunter, there's a 30% chance they'll be able to kill the wolf and survive. Otherwise, the Hunter will be killed by the wolves, but may be able to take one down (instead of choosing a player to kill) as they go! For two wolves, the chance of killing one of them is 50%. For three, it's 70%; for four, 90%, and for packs with five wolves or more, the Hunter will definitely be able to kill one of them as they die!
NO ACTIONS, until they die!

The Serial Killer can choose a player every night to attack and kill. They win if they're the last one alive! There's no one that can't be killed by the Serial Killer, and visiting their house isn't a good idea, since everyone who tries will die... Serial Killers can only be killed by being lynched or shot (by the Gunner or the Hunter).
NIGHT ACTIONS, every night!

Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
ACTIONS AT EVERY TIME OF THE DAY... Para is busy!
